description:
Yukino Bijin and Mayano Top Gun are dazzled by Golden City`s modeling work. But then City herself decides to show them that it`s not as far beyond their reach as they`re imagining.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akogare no Sekai wa Hora Koko ni
The World You`ve Dreamed of Is Right in Front of You
憧れの世界はホラここに
